;slrule: All trades in the live phase should have a stop loss in place âš ï¸ It does not need to be set immediately, but it must be added before closing the trade. Trades without a stop loss may be considered a rule violation. If you would like clarification, feel free to ask.
;consis: To request a withdrawal, your consistency must be 20 percent or lower. This means your highest profit day divided by 0.2 must equal your total profit target. If you want help calculating this, just let me know ğŸ˜Š
;kyc: For the Special Instant Account, you need to reach 2.5 percent profit, maintain 20 percent consistency, and have at least five profitable days. For the Instant Pro Account, the requirement is 4 percent profit with the same consistency and minimum days. Once completed, you can open a ticket or contact support. Your KYC link will be sent by email within 24 to 48 business hours.
;web: If you are having trouble accessing the website, please try clearing your cache and cookies, using a different browser, disabling your VPN, or checking your internet connection. If the issue continues, let us know and we will help you further.
;end: Thank you for contacting our support team ğŸ’™ We are always here if you need help. We wish you the best on your trading journey.
;host: To help with the giveaway, please collect the participant's full name, email address, and country of residence. Also include the giveaway link and a short video showing the conversation on X with the profile visible. Once everything is ready, send it in one message.
;askhost: Please ask the giveaway host to open a support ticket. This helps us verify winners more efficiently. Thank you for your cooperation ğŸ˜Š
;xg: Please send your full name, email address, and country of residence or X username so we can proceed ğŸ˜Š
;claim: We are happy to help you claim your giveaway account ğŸ‰ Please share your name, email address, and country. Once received, we will take care of the rest.
;3step: Giveaway accounts follow the 3 Step Challenge model. The profit targets are 8 percent for phase one, 5 percent for phase two, and 5 percent for phase three. A minimum of three profitable days is required with at least 0.1 percent per day. Please check the FAQ for full details.
;2step: The 2 Step Challenge includes unlimited trading days, an 80 percent profit split, a minimum of three profitable days, and a 14 day reward cycle. The profit targets are 8 percent for phase one and 6 percent for phase two. There is no consistency rule on this account.
;1step: The 1 Step Challenge includes unlimited trading days, an 80 percent profit split, a minimum of three profitable days, and a 14 day reward cycle. The profit target is 10 percent. There is no consistency rule on this account.
;10k: The 10K for 10 Dollar account is a one time purchase instant funding account. The minimum and maximum withdrawal is 90 dollars after fees and profit split. A maximum risk of 1.5 percent per trade applies. This account is eligible for one payout only and requires 20 percent consistency with at least five profitable days.
;2min: All trades must be held for a minimum of two minutes. Trades closed before this time may be considered a rule violation.
;ip: Your IP address should remain within the same general region while trading. Switching between WiFi and mobile data is allowed as long as the location remains nearby. If you expect a larger location change, please contact support before trading.
;news: Trades should not be opened or closed two minutes before or after major news events. Trades placed during this time may not count toward passing your account.
;profit: To pass an account, a minimum number of profitable days is required. For 1 Step and 2 Step accounts, at least three profitable days with a minimum of 0.25 percent per day are needed. For 3 Step accounts, at least three profitable days with a minimum of 0.1 percent per day are required.
;ea: Expert Advisors are allowed as long as they follow all trading rules. If requested, you may need to show that your EA complies with our policies. High frequency or prohibited systems are not allowed.
;cap: Withdrawal caps apply as follows. The first withdrawal is capped at 3 percent of the starting balance. After the first withdrawal, the cap increases to 8 percent. After the second withdrawal, traders may withdraw up to 10,000 dollars every two payout cycles. Instant accounts follow a different cap structure as outlined in the FAQ.
;payout: Funded account payouts are available after 14 days by default or 7 days with the add on. Processing usually takes up to three business days. The minimum withdrawal amount is 125 dollars after fees. Instant account payouts are available on demand once requirements are met.
;affiliate: You can join our affiliate program by registering at https://www.nextlevelfunded.com/affiliate. If you need help during registration, feel free to reach out ğŸ˜Š

;haveconsis: For instant funding and fixed amount accounts, the most profitable day must remain under 20 percent of total profits to request a payout. If this level is exceeded, the payout will be delayed until the account becomes compliant again.
;cred: Please check your spam or junk folder for your account credentials. If you cannot find them, share your email address and account number and I will help you further ğŸ˜Š
;day: Example of consistency calculation. If your highest profit day is 1,200 dollars, your total profit must reach 6,000 dollars to remain within the 20 percent rule. All other trading days must stay at or below the highest profit day.
;leverage: Leverage varies by account type. Challenge accounts offer higher leverage than instant accounts. If you need details for a specific instrument, let me know.
;countries: Some countries are restricted from trading with Next Level Funded. Please check eligibility before requesting a payout so we can assist you properly.
